body:
How I can make a page like this? Really I really like, is simple but nice, and I like to have the same or similar. If anyone knows how you can say I appreciate it.
Regards ^-^

title: Website Creation.

replies.body: Look into twitter bootstrap. However, if you want to manage a forum like this you will need knowledge of PhP and possibly MySQL. Another option is to create a subreddit on reddit, which is easy but not quite the same style of forum.
